text: ye jyaada qareen qayaas hai ki is tarah par (aakherat ke dar se) theek theek gavaahee den ya (duniya kee roosavaee ka) andesha ho ki kaheen hamaaree qasamen doosare phareeq kee qasamon ke baad rad na kar dee jaen musalamaanon khuda se daro aur (jee laga kar) sun lo aur khuda badachalan logon ko manzile maqasood tak nahin pahunchaata
